Commands.TableDescription: Select a system RollTable to roll for
Commands.TableHelp: Show all tables as clickable links in chat.
Commands.PropertiesDescription: Post Item Property's description to Chat
Commands.AvailabilityDescription: Roll for an item availability based on settlement and rarity.
Commands.PlayerPayDescription: Pay specified amount of money from your character's inventory.
Commands.GMPayDescription: Handle displaying "pay" chat card or automatic payment.
Commands.GMPayAmountHint: Syntax: amount — displays "Pay" chat card for all users
Commands.GMPayPlayerHint: Syntax: amount player — displays "Pay" chat card only for specified player
Commands.GMPayActorHint: Syntax: amount actor — automatically deducts amount from specified actor
Commands.CreditDescription: Handle giving money to the players.
Commands.CreditAmountHint: Syntax: amount — displays a chat card for all users that allows them to receive a share of money
Commands.CreditPlayerHint: Syntax: amount player — displays chat card only for specified player
Commands.CreditActorHint: Syntax: amount actor — automatically awards amount of money to the specified actor
Commands.Each: Each — every user will be able to receive the specified amount
Commands.Split: Split — (default) the specified amount will be split between all online users
Commands.CorruptionDescription: Prompt all the players to roll against Corrupting Influences of specified strength.
Commands.CorruptionMinor: Minor — failing will award player's characters 1 point of Corruption.
Commands.CorruptionModerate: Moderate — failing will award player's characters 2 point of Corruption.
Commands.CorruptionMajor: Major — failing will award player's characters 3 points of Corruption.
Commands.FearDescription: Prompt players to perform a Fear check
Commands.TerrorDescription: Prompt players to perform a Terror check
Commands.TravelDescription: Show a distance and travel time between two locations
Commands.TravelHelp: Show all locations as clickable links in chat.
Commands.ExpDescription: Post a chat card that lets players receive Experience
Commands.TradeDescription: Open the Trade dialog using "Death on the Reik" or "Sea of Claws" trade rules
